qas.question: The version of Twilight Princess fo which console won three IGN awards?
What was Twilight Princess's rank among all Nintendo games according to Nintendo Magazine?
Where did Twilight Princess place among Wii titles according to IGN?
Where did Twilight Princess rank on Nintendo Power's list of Nintendo games in the 2000s?
What 2 critics gave Twilight Princess awards for Best Graphics and Best Story?
What award did Game Critics Awards and GameSpy give Twilight Princess?
What place did the game take in Nintendo's Official list of 100 Greatest Nintendo Games of All Time?
What place did IGN give the game on the Wii console?
What was Game Radar's rank among all Nintendo games according to Nintendo Magazine?
Where did Twilight Princess place among Nintendo Power titles according to IGN?
Where did Twilight Princess rank on Game Radar's list of Nintendo games in the 2000s?
What 2 critics gave Game Radar awards for Best Graphics and Best Story?
What award did Game Radars Awards and GameSpy give Twilight Princess?

context: Twilight Princess received the awards for Best Artistic Design, Best Original Score, and Best Use of Sound from IGN for its <a0_0>GameCube<a0_0/> version. Both <a4_0><b11_0>IGN and Nintendo Power<b11_0/><a4_0/> gave Twilight Princess the awards for Best Graphics and Best Story. Twilight Princess received Game of the Year awards from GameTrailers, 1UP.com, Electronic Gaming Monthly, Game Informer, Games Radar, GameSpy, Spacey Awards, X-Play and Nintendo Power. It was also given awards for Best Adventure Game from the Game Critics Awards, X-Play, IGN, GameTrailers, 1UP.com, and Nintendo Power. The game was considered the <a5_0><b12_0>Best Console Game<b12_0/><a5_0/> by the Game Critics Awards and GameSpy. The game placed <a1_0><a6_0><b8_0>16th<b8_0/><a6_0/><a1_0/> in Official Nintendo Magazine's list of the 100 Greatest Nintendo Games of All Time. IGN ranked the game as the <a2_0><a7_0><b9_0>4th<b9_0/><a7_0/><a2_0/>-best Wii game. Nintendo Power ranked the game as the <a3_0><b10_0>third<b10_0/><a3_0/>-best game to be released on a Nintendo system in the 2000s decade.
